1. Focus on emotional and mental health.

Barbara connects emotional well-being to cancer prevention. 

Chronic stress can weaken your immune system, so she recommends:

• Breathing practices
• Surrounding yourself with positive influences 
• Reducing stress through prayer,… https://t.co/YQUCSGVTfN https://t.co/NglZlcczsa

6. Sunlight exposure.

Vitamin D from sunlight is vital for cancer prevention. 

Barbara advises 15-30 minutes of safe sun exposure daily to maintain healthy vitamin D levels and support immune function. https://t.co/i0vUm8jLd9

Cancer prevention involves adopting a healthy lifestyle and making choices that reduce the risk of developing cancer.Key strategies include:
1.Avoiding tobacco
2 .Eating a healthy diet
3 Maintaining a regular weight
4.Protecting skin from the sun
5. Getting vaccinated

Make it a daily drink
The bitterness in hot lemon water is the best substance to prevent cancer cells.
Cold lemon water only has vitamin C, no cancer prevention.
Hot lemon water can control cancer tumor growth.

Both yellow and purple sweet potato have good cancer prevention properties.

01. Often taking late night dinner can increase the chance of stomach cancer
02. Take more than 3 eggs per week
03. Eating chicken backside can cause stomach cancer

Men, did you know that a few simple lifestyle changes could help you avoid some of the most common health risks?

From your heart health to cancer prevention, here are 5 diseases you should know about, and how to reduce your risk

@Jamoooret @MakisMD Hard COVID was treated with immunosuppressive drugs, leading to hyperinfection of the parasite Strongyloides stercoralis — causing sudden deaths. Fun fact: Ivermectin is the only drug that kills it.  It sparked the false claim it kills the virus. But it kills cancer-cause too
